snippet: Republican delegates neared approval of a party platform that is staunchly conservative in matters of gender, sexuality and marriage....
abstract: Republican National Committee has drafted platform that reflects views of presumptive presidential nominee Donald Trump on issues like national defense and immigration, but moves sharply right on social issues like gay rights and religion; lack of interference by Trump or his aides has allowed conservative activists greater influence in drafting platform.
lead_paragraph: Republican delegates neared approval of a party platform that is staunchly conservative in matters of gender, sexuality and marriage.

headline.main: Emerging Republican Platform Goes Far to the Right
headline.print_headline: Republicans Draft Platform That Reflects Trump, Then Heads to the Right
